about_the_game:
Your little world is falling apart! You must breach into another dimension, sneak in, and steal their 'World Core' to save your own. The bag you're carrying seems big enough to fit four 'World Cores' and still have room to spare...

Breachwalk Survivor is a single-player game with roguelite elements consists of series of small rounds. Gather shards in each round to buy items and survive until you collect enough 'dimensional shards' and 'World cores'.

Starting Tips

  • Before you start playing, take a look at the blueprint and plan out what item combinations you want to use.

  • Be quick! Dropped gems and dimensional shards disappear when time runs out!

  • You don't have to spend all your shards every round. As long as you don't die, you can spend them in the level-up shop in the next round.

  • You get double shards for each 'World Core' you bring back! Try to bring back as many as you can.

Features

  • Survive rounds lasting 30 to 90 seconds each and kill off as many enemies as you can during that time.

  • Collect shards to gain experience to get access to item shops between rounds.

  • After the run, you can buy perks to power you up and unlock blueprints to get new item combinations.

Initial release on early access includes:

  • 1 character with 6 perks

  • 3 end weapons

  • 1 blueprint

  • 1 boss

  • 3 map types

The Full released version will contain more characters, and other features.

name: Breachwalk Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Breachwalk Survivor is a single-player game combines survivor genre with inventory management. Before sneaking into another dimension, it’s better to plan which weapons to craft and strategize the path. Stealing just one 'World Core' will save your world, but there’s still extra space in your bag...
